ABOUT MENUS ICE CREAM RECIPES + BLOG
ABOUT MENUS ICE CREAM RECIPES + BLOG

I dream of ice cream...

In 2015 I had a dream to start a vegan ice cream line. Four years plus two babies later, it’s in my reality. Starting a food product is one of the most challenging things I’ve ever done. Imagine what you think goes into the process, then times it by a hundred. Luckily for me, I’m always up for a challenge and thrive on getting sh*t done. I wanted to create something that of course was delicious but would also be as creamy and as comforting as the "real deal". Our heavenly coconut cream based ice cream is now is full swing, small batch production mode at our commercial kitchen in Karratha Western Australia and we are well on our way to converting all of the dairy free skeptics out there. To watch the journey unfolded, see our Vegan Ice Cream Instagram story highlight. It’s full of road blocks, hurdles, moments where you just have to laugh or you’ll cry, and hopefully a tonne of inspiration for anyone else wanting to start a food product.

INGREDIENTS + NUTRITIONAL INFO

CHOCOLATE ICE CREAM

CHOCOLATE ICE CREAM

Servings per package 1, Serving size 125g

AVE. QUANTITY PER SERVE

ENERGY 1400kj, PROTEIN 3.4g, FAT TOTAL 24.6g, SATURATED 21.5g, CARBOHYDRATES 24.9g, SUGARS 16.5g, SODIUM 21mg

INGREDIENTS

Coconut cream (81%), coconut sugar, coconut nectar, cacao powder (4%), guar gum

PASSIONFRUIT ICE CREAM

PASSIONFRUIT ICE CREAM

Servings per package 1, Serving size 125g

AVE. QUANTITY PER SERVE

ENERGY 1290kj, PROTEIN 1.9g, FAT TOTAL 24g, SATURATED 21.1g, CARBOHYDRATES 21.5g, SUGARS 15.5g, SODIUM 20mg

INGREDIENTS

Coconut cream (85%), coconut sugar, coconut nectar, passionfruit powder (2%), guar gum

VANILLA ICE CREAM

VANILLA ICE CREAM

Servings per package 1, Serving size 125g

AVE. QUANTITY PER SERVE

ENERGY 1250G, PROTEIN 1.9g, FAT TOTAL 24g, SATURATED 21.1g, CARBOHYDRATES 19.8g, SUGARS 13.9g, SODIUM 20mg

INGREDIENTS

Coconut cream (86%), coconut sugar, coconut nectar, vanilla extract (1%), guar gum
